NumberOfActors.Name: Number of Actors
NumberOfActors.Hint: Enter how many actors do you want rolled. Use with CAUTION if Dice So Nice! is enabled.

DiceSoNiceEnabled.Name: Dice So Nice!
DiceSoNiceEnabled.Hint: If checked, and Dice So Nice! is installed and enabled, 3D dice will be rolled across your screen only.

NameFormat.Name: Name Format
NameFormat.Hint: Character Name format if no name is provided.

AbilitiesRollMethod.Name: Number of d6's Rolled
AbilitiesRollMethod.Hint: Select how many d6 are to be rolled

DropLowestDieRoll.Name: Drop Lowest Die Roll
DropLowestDieRoll.Hint: This setting will drop the lowest die roll.

ReRollOnes.Name: Reroll Ones
ReRollOnes.Hint: This setting will cause 1's to be rerolled until a 1 is not rolled.

NumberOfRolls.Name: Number of Sets Rolled
NumberOfRolls.Hint: Select how many sets of die are to be rolled

DropLowestSet.Name: Drop Lowest Set
DropLowestSet.Hint: This setting will drop the lowest set of die rolls.

BonusPoints.Name: Bonus Points
BonusPoints.Hint: Select how many bonus points are to be awarded

Over18Allowed.Name: Scores Over 18 Allowed
Over18Allowed.Hint: Checking this setting will allow scores over 18 when distributing rolled scores and/or bonuses. Setting is ignored when Distribute Results is unchecked - and no Bonus Points are awarded.

DistributeResults.Name: Distribute Results
DistributeResults.Hint: This setting will allow distribution of results freely among abilities.

HideResultsZone.Name: Hide Results Zone
HideResultsZone.Hint: This setting will hide Results Zone when DistributeResults is unchecked.

ChatRemoveConfigureActorButton.Name: Remove Configure Actor Button
ChatRemoveConfigureActorButton.Hint: This setting will remove the Configure Actor button when clicked.

ChatShowDescription.Name: Show Description
ChatShowDescription.Hint: Hide/Show character description in chat message.

ChatShowMethodText.Name: Show Method Text
ChatShowMethodText.Hint: Hide/Show Method text in chat message

ChatShowResultsText.Name: Show Results Text
ChatShowResultsText.Hint: Hide/Show Results text in chat message

ChatShowCondensedResults.Name: Show Condensed Ability Results
ChatShowCondensedResults.Hint: Display Ability results in condensed form if Show Results Text is checked.

ChatShowBonusPointsText.Name: Show Bonus Points Text
ChatShowBonusPointsText.Hint: Hide/Show Bonus Points text in chat message

ChatShowDifficultyText.Name: Show Difficulty Text
ChatShowDifficultyText.Hint: Hide/Show Difficulty text in chat message

ChatShowNoteFromDM.Name: Show Note From DM
ChatShowNoteFromDM.Hint: Hide/Show Note From DM in chat message

note-from-dm.label: Note from DM
note-from-dm.distribute-freely: You may distribute these scores among your abilities as you desire.
note-from-dm.apply-as-rolled: Each result will be applied to abilities in the order they were rolled.
note-from-dm.distribute-bonus-points: The Bonus Point(s) may be distributed among any of your scores.
